title: ‘It’s going to be all out’: Sprinters fight to survive time cut on Tour de France’s toughest day
content:
Three opportunities remain for the fast men in the peloton, but they will have to beat dominant sprinter Jasper Philipsen and survive the Alps to take victory.

Read the full article at ‘It’s going to be all out’: Sprinters fight to survive time cut on Tour de France’s toughest day on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
